hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT EOWA_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, EOWA_SEQUENCE, EOWA_WORK_NO, EOWA_STATUS_CODE, EOWA_STATUS_NAME, EOWA_STATUS_COLOR, EOWA_ACTUAL_TIME, EOWA_OPERATOR_CODE, EOWA_OPERATOR_NAME, EOWA_LOCATION_CODE, EOWA_LOCATION_NAME, EOWA_REMARK, EOWA_REMARK_NAME_A, EOWA_REMARK_VALUE_A, EOWA_REMARK_NAME_B, EOWA_REMARK_VALUE_B, EOWA_REMARK_NAME_C, EOWA_REMARK_VALUE_C, EOWA_REMARK_NAME_D, EOWA_REMARK_VALUE_D, EOWA_REMARK_NAME_E, EOWA_REMARK_VALUE_E, EOWA_EVENT_STATUS_CODE, EOWA_OPERATE_DATE FROM EO_WORK_STATUS EOWA WHERE 1 = 1 << AND EOWA.EOWA_WORK_NO IN (:eowaWorkNos) >>
/*根据创建时间、序号倒序排序*/ ORDER BY EOWA.CREATE_TIME,EOWA.EOWA_OPERATE_DATE,EOWA.EOWA_SEQUENCE DESC
